content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 12: The Department of Hydrology and Meteorology said that the low pressure trough of the monsoon is currently situated around the average position. The weather according to the department will generally be cloudy across the country today. This afternoon, there is a possibility of moderate rainfall in the hilly areas of Koshi, Bag

title: Some places likely to receive moderate to heavy rainfall
